title: Welcome to the World of Feedback
content: Thank you for joining us! We're excited to hear your thoughts and suggestions. Your feedback helps us improve and deliver a better experience. Feel free to share your opinions anytime.

title: Account Activity Notification
content: Your account has been accessed from a new device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.

title: Anonymous Message Received
content: You have a new anonymous message. Log into your account to read and respond to it.
